replace_confirm_message: An entry for today already exists. Do you want to replace it?
no_entries_yet: No entries yet. Start by adding a thought on the Today page!
select_month_to_export: Select a month to export your thoughts.
failed_to_save_entry: Failed to save your entry. Please try again.
failed_to_load_entries_for_month: Failed to load entries for selected month.
corrupted_data_description: There was an issue reading your saved data. This can sometimes happen. You can try to close this message, but if the app is not working correctly, you may need to reset your data.
reset_warning: Resetting will delete all your entries.
daily_prompt_lead: Take a breath, slow down, and write the single moment that matters most today.
history_lead: Revisit previous reflections and notice the patterns forming over time.
export_lead: Gather your thoughts for safekeeping or sharing in a format that works for you.
